name: The Old West World
overview: The Old West World a Game for the C64Maxi/Mini or a Real C64 and of course a Good C64 Emulator (Vice, Etc). 1 Player Push Scroll Left shoot em up, Shoot the Baddies but save the Lady's by walking into Them. Made with the side ways Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells, Also V3 SEUCK Framework by Richard Bayliss.
